name: capstone-g1

scripts.back_first: createdb endeavor_db && cd backend && psql -f db/seed.sql -d endeavor_db && npm run dev
scripts.back: cd backend && psql -f db/seed.sql -d endeavor_db && npm run dev
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
